analysis.Summary: Vue single-file component rendering a circular SVG placeholder for user avatars.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a default user picture icon when no actual avatar is available in the application.

Components.name: PlaceholderUserpic
Components.responsibility: Renders an SVG graphic consisting of a dark circle background and a semi-transparent white user-silhouette path.

Dependencies: None at the module level. Uses CSS custom properties (--black, --white) for coloring.
Notes: No <script> or <style> sectionsâ€”purely a presentational SVG template.
Relies on global CSS variables (--black, --white) for theming.
Lightweight, zero-JS implementation for maximum performance.
